abstract.t: This document outlines and describes the metrics that are to be used forevaluation and mutual comparison of individual computer authenticationmethods and the methodology for use of such metrics by the expertcommunity.The metrics described in this document were tested and used bythe KAAPS Group for purposes of KAAPS science project (ID 2C08002).Theproject was funded by Czech ministry of education (MSMT NPV II,ID2C08002).
